text: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

translation.en: And indeed, each [of the believers and disbelievers] - your Lord will fully compensate them for their deeds. Indeed, He is Acquainted with what they do
translation.id: Dan sesungguhnya kepada masing-masing (yang berselisih itu) pasti Tuhanmu akan memberi balasan secara penuh atas perbuatan mereka. Sungguh, Dia Mahateliti atas apa yang mereka kerjakan
